body.p: Some commentators on E54 felt that the proposal to measure plan assets at market value would not be consistent with IAS 22 Business Combinations and with the measurement of financial assets as proposed in the discussion paper Accounting for Financial Assets and Financial Liabilities published by IASC’s Financial Instruments Steering Committee in March 1997. Consequently, IASC decided that plan assets should be measured at fair value.
